nas_snapshot_informations: A snapshot is an instantaneous capture of the status of your NAS, at the precise moment that the snapashot is taken.
nas_snapshot_informations_size: Warning: snapshots use up space on your partition in order to function properly. No snapshot history is saved: for snapshots of the same frequency, the last snapshot taken will overwrite the previous one.
